name: CustomNutrientCodeSystem
title: Custom Nutrient Code System
description: A CodeSystem defining custom nutrient codes not present in the official NutritionProduct valueset.

concept.definition: A form of betaine used as a nutrient.
A calcium salt used as a dietary supplement.
A calcium salt of lauric acid used in nutritional supplements.
Berries used in the production of pharmaceuticals or dietary supplements.
A natural or artificial additive used to improve the taste or smell of a product.
A naturally occurring dicarboxylic acid, typically used as an excipient.
a finely milled powder made from rice, typically used as an excipient.
An essential trace element that helps the body form connective tissue, bones, blood clotting factors, and sex hormones.
A mineral that plays an important role in supporting your metabolism and maintaining brain health.
